name: ELEX WooCommerce Google Shopping (Google Product Feed)
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
The ELEX WooCommerce Google Shopping (Google Product Feed) plugin is a free WooCommerce plugin that serves in feeding your WooCommerce products to Google so that when online shoppers search for on Google, they can find your products in the Google search results and Google Shopping Ads. Even though if you have implemented the best SEO strategy for your WooCommerce product pages to come up in the Google SERPs, this free Google product feed plugin for WooCommerce shows the preview of the product with information like product title, product image, price, availability, color, and so on.

With this plugin, you can generate the Google Shopping Feed file in various formats (XML, CSV & TSV) that contains information about your products and that should be uploaded in your Google Merchant Account. Using this plugin, You can schedule the cron jobs for daily, weekly or monthly basis to make sure the changes made on the properties and price of products are updated on Google. Easily map your product categories to Google categories as well as Google attributes to your product attributes based on the rules you can set. The ability to set the rules and conditions while mapping the categories and attributes makes this plugin so powerful tool to integrate WooCommerce with Google Shopping.

Features

  • Display WooCommerce Products on Google Shopping Ads.
  • Unlimited Feeds, Feed Templates & Jobs.
  • Supports Multiple Countries & Feed File Formats.
  • Update the Feed Automatically with Schedule Feature.
  • Easily Map WooCommerce Product Category with Google Category.
  • Powerful Attribute Mapping Based on Rules & Conditions.
  • Easily Customise the Feed Attribute Values.
  • Map Any Custom Fields With Google Product Feed attributes.
  • Set Product Specific Values at Product Level.
  • Dashboard to Create and Manage Multiple Feeds.
  • Google Shopping Feed for Simple Products.
  • Manage created Google Product Feeds.

Premium version Features

For complete list of latest features and details, please visit ELEX WooCommerce Google Shopping (Google Product Feed) premium version product page.

  • Include support for Product Variations.
  • Support Multiple Languages for Google Product Categories.
  • Timely compatibility updates and bug fixes.
  • Premium Support!

Premium Version walkthrough Video

Documentation

Visit the Product Documentation for ELEX WooCommerce Google Shopping (Google Product Feed).

About Google Shopping | Google Product Feed

In order to upload your product data in Google Merchant Center, you will first need to create a feed to which you can submit your data. This step is required for any new feed, and once a feed is registered, you can update the existing feed without having to register it again. More information about google product feed and google merchant center can be found on this beginner’s guide from Google.

About ELEXtensions

We are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it! you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
1.What if I face issues with the plugin? Do you provide support for free products?
If you are facing any issues, please create a topic at plugin support section on wordpress org. Our team will respond back soon.
sections.changelog:
1.4.1

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 8.5
  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.4.3

1.4.0

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 8.4
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.4
  • Made compatible with HPOS.
  • Made compatible with PHP 8.2

1.3.7

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.8
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.2
  • Filter using the Stock status.
  • Added an option to choose Currency Code.

1.3.6

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.3

1.3.5

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.1
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.1

1.3.4

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.7
  • Fixed refresh schedule issue

1.3.3

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.6
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.0

1.3.2

  • Fixed issue with mapping sub categories

1.3.1

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.4

1.3.0

  • Tested OK with WordPress 5.9

1.2.9

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.1
  • Tested OK with WordPress 5.8
  • Added Google attribute ‘Quantity’ for local inventory feeds
  • Removed file path from settings
  • Fixed WordPress table does not exist warning

1.2.8

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 5.9

1.2.7

  • compatible with phpcs
  • added Sale price attribute
  • Tested with Woocommerce 5.8

1.2.6

  • Fixed Fatal error

1.2.5

  • Bug fixes
  • Tested with Woocommerce 5.7

1.2.4

  • Issue – Improved coding standards.

1.2.3

  • Issue – Feed not getting generated when any product category is in different language otherthan English.

1.2.2

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.5.

1.2.1

  • Issue when edit feed – Not able to map default category and getting infinite reload.

1.2.0

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.4.

1.1.9

  • Updated XML to RSS Version 2.0
  • Removed Skip and Continue option while editing the feed
  • Displaying Excluded products and reasons after generating the feed
  • Toggle Switch for including Variations and Auto-Identifier exists options
  • XML Data enhancement
  • An option to view Feed Performance Report in the manage feed tab
  • Tax configuration for all the countries by selecting Price includes Tax attribute
  • Excluding Products in the feed based on required attributes of Google Merchant Centre

1.1.8

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.3.

1.1.7

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.2.
  • Tested with WordPress 5.7.

1.1.6

  • Tested OK with Woocommerce 4.9.

1.1.5

  • Tested OK with WordPress 5.6.
  • Tested OK with Woocommerce 4.8.

1.1.4

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.7.

1.1.3

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.6.

1.1.2

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.5.

1.1.1

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.4.

1.1.0

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.2.

1.0.9

  • Tested with WooCommerce 4.1.

1.0.8

  • Minor change – Content updated.

1.0.7

  • WordPress 5.4 compatibility.

1.0.6

  • Support of multiple languages for choosing the Google Category

1.0.5

  • Fixed activation issue

1.0.4

  • Added – Introduced TSV file generator option
  • Added – Introduced CSV file generator option
  • Added – Show created and modified date with time
  • Added – An improved UI under attribute mapping tab
  • Added – An option to add meta key values under settings
  • Added – An option to store the feeds by giving a file path under settings
  • Added – Options to map more product attributes
  • Added – An option to exclude products based on search
  • Added – Better scheduling option
  • Added – An option to Map category
  • Added – Pause and play scheduling option
  • Added – Showing created and modified dates of the feed in the manage feed tab

1.0.3

  • WordPress 5.3 compatibility.

1.0.2

  • Updated content.

1.0.1

  • Corrected plugin links.

1.0.0

  • Initial Version release.
sections.screenshots:
1. Map one or more Google Product categories with your WooCommerce product categories.

  2. Add additional Google product fields and map to WooCommerce product attributes.

  3. Append Prepend product attributes.

  4. Exclude products from selected categories.

  5. Map any custom fields with Google Product Feed attributes.

  6. Manage Feeds

  7. Create an XML file for Google Shopping

sections.reviews:
Great plugin and support team

By dariasyn on December 13, 2023

I recently encountered an issue with plugin and theme compatibility, which I reported to support. Manager Bronia was very helpful and efficiently resolved the problem. Based on this great support experience, I can recommend this plugin, especially the paid version. Their prompt assistance and effective resolution made a difference for me.

Perfect Plugin

By findikhikayeleri on November 16, 2023

It's a nice plugin. Simple and convenient to use. It would be great if there is an update for new WordPress versions.

Quick response and solution.

By ian2020 on December 8, 2022

Responded to my query quickly and provided a fix. Friendly and helpful service. Thank you.

Support (?) Coding (?) Integrety (?) Professional (?)

By tiro8221 on September 26, 2022

DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM THESE PEOPLE. Nothing but a lot of hype in their marketing of the products that they have. The coders do not have a clue...technical support is a scam, the program I purchase does not perform at all in comparison...BUYER BEWARE!!!

Lost all category mapping data overnight

By attebauwz on September 6, 2022

Lost all category mapping data overnight

Of course ... 5 stars

By entiposis on August 5, 2022

Very useful plugin and if you run into problems, the support team is working really fast for this free product. Excellent work, excellent support.

Only works in US

By stefaneeklund on March 17, 2022

Does not work with tax settings (VAT) other than in US. Also problems with saving, and description filed gets full of html, and does only support US characters.

very simple and useful new update doesnt work

By d4nk1337sauce on June 15, 2021

everything works great if you download version 1.1.8 which lets you make a feed only using attributes you want. would be nice to set a rule for default value if no value is set for specific attributes

Does not Save

By pipedreamdesign on May 13, 2021

Hi, Great plugin, much better than the rest, however when i change a default value, say change Adult to 'no', then save and then go back to edit the feed it loses my selection?

Great customer support

By lenx290 on February 17, 2021

I used free version and customer support very helpful
